00020 #include "ObjectModelOrientedPlane.h"
00021 
00022 namespace brics_3d {
00023 
00024 void ObjectModelOrientedPlane::selectWithinDistance(const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold,
00025                         std::vector<int> &inliers){
00026 
00027      // Obtain the plane normal
00028      Eigen::Vector4d coeff = model_coefficients;
00029      coeff[3] = 0;
00030 
00031      // Check against template, if given
00032      if (epsAngle > 0.0)
00033      {
00034        double angleDifference = fabs (getAngle3D (axis, coeff));
00035        angleDifference = fmin (angleDifference, M_PI - angleDifference);
00036        // Check whether the current plane model satisfies our angle threshold criterion with
00037        //respect to the given axis
00038        if (angleDifference > epsAngle)
00039        {
00040          inliers.resize (0);
00041          return;
00042        }
00043      }
00044 
00045      this->selectWithinDistance (model_coefficients, threshold, inliers);
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 void ObjectModelOrientedPlane::getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00050                 std::vector<double> &distances){
00051     assert (model_coefficients.size () == 4);
00052 
00053     // Obtain the plane normal
00054     Eigen::Vector4d coeff = model_coefficients;
00055     coeff[3] = 0;
00056 
00057     // Check against template, if given
00058     if (epsAngle > 0.0)
00059     {
00060       double angleDifference = fabs (getAngle3D (axis, coeff));
00061       angleDifference = fmin (angleDifference, M_PI - angleDifference);
00062       // Check whether the current plane model satisfies our angle threshold criterion with respect to the given axis
00063       if (angleDifference > epsAngle)
00064       {
00065         distances.resize (0);
00066         return;
00067       }
00068     }
00069 
00070     this->getDistancesToModel (model_coefficients, distances);
00071 }
